settings.text1: US delivery is always Super Fast and Free Shipping on orders over $50
settings.text2: Not right for you after 30 days? No problem, it’s on us.

settings.heading: What it is
settings.richtext: Dehydrated skin can leave your face feeling more like a prune than a juicy grape, but Hada Labo Tokyo is here to fight your dehydration woes. The Hada Labo Concentrated Water Serum Lock-in-Moist brings innovative Japanese Hylauronic Acid technology to your daily ritual to deeply infuse skin with essential hydration and strengthen the skin over time! Powered by Super Hyaluronic Acid™, which acts as a moisture shot for the skin, keeping optimal hydration levels for hours after application. The serum minimises visual signs of stress, leaving the skin looking and feeling healthy, revitalised, and nourished. Perfect to be used after the Hada Labo Tokyo Nº1 Lotion for skin that stays hydrated for longer.

settings.heading: Specifications
settings.richtext: Unlock the Secret to Perfect Skin with Hada Labo Tokyo's Advanced Specifications.

settings.heading: Is this for you?
settings.subheading: Like a tall glass of water after a hot day, this Hada Labo Tokyo serum saturates skin with hydration for dewy and healthy skin.

settings.title: Powerful Ingredients To Fuel Your Skin
